verbose_text: The present results show that bufalin significantly inhibits the upregulation of Twist2 and ZEB2, but does not affect Smad independent signaling pathways, including AKT, ERK, p38 and JNK MAP kinases, during TGF-beta-mediated EMT in A549 cells.
evidence: bufalin significantly inhibits the upregulation of Twist2 and ZEB2
